languages.text: {n}Медикарий поднимает глаза и с упоением начинает вспоминать.{/n} "Сначала я заметил слабый свет в стороне, но решил, что кто-то включил хирургический {g|Encyclopedia:Lumen}люмен{/g}. Свет становился ярче, и, когда я повернулся к нему, он пронизал меня насквозь! Я видел свои мускулы, органы и кости сквозь кожу, был нагим телом и душой, словно подле самого {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThroneGlossary}Трона{/g}".

{n}The officer raises his eyes to the ceiling and recollects with rapt abandon:{/n} "First I noticed a faint light out of the corner of my eye, but thought it was a surgical {g|Encyclopedia:Lumen}lumen{/g} someone had turned on. The light grew brighter, and when I turned toward it, it shone right through me! I saw my muscles, organs, and bones under my skin. I was bared, body and soul, as if I was standing by the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThroneGlossary}Throne{/g} itself."
languages.original_text: {n}Медикарий поднимает глаза и с упоением начинает вспоминать.{/n} "Сначала я заметил слабый свет в стороне, но решил, что кто-то включил хирургический {g|Encyclopedia:Lumen}люмен{/g}. Свет становился ярче, и, когда я повернулся к нему, он пронизал меня насквозь! Я видел свои мускулы, органы и кости сквозь кожу, был нагим телом и душой, словно подле самого {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThroneGlossary}Трона{/g}".

traits.locale_text: {n}The medicae officer raises his eyes to the sky and recollects with rapt abandon.{/n} "First I noticed a faint light to my side, but thought it was a surgical lumen someone had turned on. The light grew brighter, and when I turned toward it, it shone right through me! I saw my muscles, organs, and bones through my skin. I was naked in body and in soul, as if I was standing by the Throne itself."

languages.text: {n}L'officier lève les yeux et fixe le plafond en décrivant sa vision avec abandon.{/n} « J'ai d'abord aperçu une lueur du coin de l'œil, mais j'ai tout de suite cru que ce n'était qu'un {g|Encyclopedia:Lumen}lumen{/g} chirurgical allumé par quelqu'un. Puis la lueur s'est intensifiée et, quand je me suis tourné vers elle, je me suis retrouvé inondé de lumière ! Elle était si brillante que je voyais mes muscles, mes organes et mes os à travers ma peau. J'étais mis à nu, corps et âme, comme si je me tenais à côté du {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThroneGlossary}Trône{/g}. »
languages.original_text: {n}The officer raises his eyes to the ceiling and recollects with rapt abandon:{/n} "First I noticed a faint light out of the corner of my eye, but thought it was a surgical {g|Encyclopedia:Lumen}lumen{/g} someone had turned on. The light grew brighter, and when I turned toward it, it shone right through me! I saw my muscles, organs, and bones under my skin. I was bared, body and soul, as if I was standing by the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThroneGlossary}Throne{/g} itself."

Puis la lueur s'est intensifiée et, quand je me suis tourné vers elle, je me suis retrouvé inondé de lumière ! Elle était si brillante que je voyais mes muscles, mes organes et mes os à travers ma peau. J'étais mis à nu, corps et âme, comme si je me tenais à côté du Trône. »

Puis la lueur s'est intensifiée et, quand je me suis tourné vers elle, je me suis retrouvé inondé de lumière ! Elle était si brillante que je voyais mes muscles, mes organes et mes os à travers ma peau. J'étais mis à nu, corps et âme, comme si je me tenais à côté du Trône. »

languages.text: {n}El oficial levanta la mirada hacia el techo y rememora su visión, embelesado:{/n} «Primero vislumbré una tenue luz por el rabillo del ojo, pero pensé que sería una {g|Encyclopedia:Lumen}lumen{/g} quirúrgica que alguien se habría dejado encendida. La luz empezó a brillar con más intensidad, ¡y cuando me volví hacia ella, su resplandor pasó a través de mí! Pude verme los músculos, órganos y huesos bajo la piel. Me sentí desnudo de cuerpo y alma, como si me hallase ante el mismísimo {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThroneGlossary}Trono{/g}».
languages.original_text: {n}The officer raises his eyes to the ceiling and recollects with rapt abandon:{/n} "First I noticed a faint light out of the corner of my eye, but thought it was a surgical {g|Encyclopedia:Lumen}lumen{/g} someone had turned on. The light grew brighter, and when I turned toward it, it shone right through me! I saw my muscles, organs, and bones under my skin. I was bared, body and soul, as if I was standing by the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThroneGlossary}Throne{/g} itself."

traits.locale_text: {n}El oficial levanta la mirada hacia el techo y rememora su visión, embelesado:{/n} «Primero vislumbré una tenue luz por el rabillo del ojo, pero pensé que sería una lumen quirúrgica que alguien se habría dejado encendida. La luz empezó a brillar con más intensidad, ¡y cuando me volví hacia ella, su resplandor pasó a través de mí! Pude verme los músculos, órganos y huesos bajo la piel. Me sentí desnudo de cuerpo y alma, como si me hallase ante el mismísimo Trono».

languages.text: {n}年轻军官抬起头望着天花板，全神贯注地回忆起来：{/n}“一开始，我留意到眼角的方向传来了一束微弱的光，但我只以为是有人打开了手术台的{g|Encyclopedia:Lumen}流明灯{/g}。但随后，那道光越来越亮，当我转向它的时候，它直直地穿透了我！我看到了我皮肤之下的肌肉、器官与骨骼。我的躯体和灵魂一丝不挂，仿佛就站在{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThroneGlossary}黄金王座{/g}旁边。”
languages.original_text: {n}The officer raises his eyes to the ceiling and recollects with rapt abandon:{/n} "First I noticed a faint light out of the corner of my eye, but thought it was a surgical {g|Encyclopedia:Lumen}lumen{/g} someone had turned on. The light grew brighter, and when I turned toward it, it shone right through me! I saw my muscles, organs, and bones under my skin. I was bared, body and soul, as if I was standing by the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThroneGlossary}Throne{/g} itself."

traits.locale_text: {n}年轻军官抬起头望着天花板，全神贯注地回忆起来：{/n}“一开始，我留意到眼角的方向传来了一束微弱的光，但我只以为是有人打开了手术台的流明灯。但随后，那道光越来越亮，当我转向它的时候，它直直地穿透了我！我看到了我皮肤之下的肌肉、器官与骨骼。我的躯体和灵魂一丝不挂，仿佛就站在黄金王座旁边。”

languages.text: {n}士官は天井に目を向けて、突然話し始めた{/n}「最初は鈍い光が見えたのですが、誰かがつけた手術用の{g|Encyclopedia:Lumen}光{/g}だと思いました。その光はどんどん明るくなり、その方向を向くと、私を貫いて光ったんです！自身の皮膚の下の筋肉、臓器、骨が見えた。まるで {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThroneGlossary}玉座{/g}の側に立っているかのように、肉体も魂も剥き出しになっていました」
languages.original_text: {n}The officer raises his eyes to the ceiling and recollects with rapt abandon:{/n} "First I noticed a faint light out of the corner of my eye, but thought it was a surgical {g|Encyclopedia:Lumen}lumen{/g} someone had turned on. The light grew brighter, and when I turned toward it, it shone right through me! I saw my muscles, organs, and bones under my skin. I was bared, body and soul, as if I was standing by the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThroneGlossary}Throne{/g} itself."

traits.locale_text: {n}士官は天井に目を向けて、突然話し始めた{/n}「最初は鈍い光が見えたのですが、誰かがつけた手術用の光だと思いました。その光はどんどん明るくなり、その方向を向くと、私を貫いて光ったんです！自身の皮膚の下の筋肉、臓器、骨が見えた。まるで玉座の側に立っているかのように、肉体も魂も剥き出しになっていました」

languages.text: {n}Der Offizier hebt den Blick zur Decke und erinnert sich entrückt: {/n}"Zunächst bemerkte ich aus dem Augenwinkel ein schwaches Licht, doch ich dachte, es sei ein chirurgisches {g|Encyclopedia:Lumen}Lumen{/g}, das jemand eingeschaltet hatte. Das Licht wurde heller, und als ich mich zu ihm umdrehte, schien es direkt durch mich hindurch! Ich habe unter meiner Haut meine Muskeln, Organe und Knochen gesehen. Ich war nackt, körperlich wie seelisch, als würde ich beim {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThroneGlossary}Thron{/g} selbst stehen."
languages.original_text: {n}The officer raises his eyes to the ceiling and recollects with rapt abandon:{/n} "First I noticed a faint light out of the corner of my eye, but thought it was a surgical {g|Encyclopedia:Lumen}lumen{/g} someone had turned on. The light grew brighter, and when I turned toward it, it shone right through me! I saw my muscles, organs, and bones under my skin. I was bared, body and soul, as if I was standing by the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThroneGlossary}Throne{/g} itself."

Das Licht wurde heller, und als ich mich zu ihm umdrehte, schien es direkt durch mich hindurch! Ich habe unter meiner Haut meine Muskeln, Organe und Knochen gesehen. Ich war nackt, körperlich wie seelisch, als würde ich beim Thron selbst stehen."

languages.text: {n}Subay ellerini tavana doğru kaldırıyor ve mest olmuş bir coşkuyla konuşuyor.{/n} "Öncelikle kenarda hafif bir ışık fark ettim ama onun birilerinin açtığı bir ameliyat {g|Encyclopedia:Lumen}lümeni{/g} olduğunu düşündüm. Işık giderek daha parlak bir hâl aldı ve ona doğru döndüğümde direkt olarak içime doğru parladı! Tenimin altındaki kaslarımı, organlarımı ve kemiklerimi gördüm. Bedenen ve ruhen içim dışım birdi, sanki direkt olarak {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThroneGlossary}Taht'ın{/g} yanında dikiliyordum."
languages.original_text: {n}The officer raises his eyes to the ceiling and recollects with rapt abandon:{/n} "First I noticed a faint light out of the corner of my eye, but thought it was a surgical {g|Encyclopedia:Lumen}lumen{/g} someone had turned on. The light grew brighter, and when I turned toward it, it shone right through me! I saw my muscles, organs, and bones under my skin. I was bared, body and soul, as if I was standing by the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThroneGlossary}Throne{/g} itself."
